website_summaries.verdict: The Contour+2 combines the best features of the entire Contour camera line in one simple, powerful flagship model.
pros: The Contour+2 captures crisp, HD video
The new Instant On-Record slider greatly increases simplicity
Bluetooth allows app connectivity, GPS allows location data to be embedded in video, and the waterproof case is now included
cons: Even with the new lower price, the Contour+2 is more expensive than the GoPro HD Hero2

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but the business was run by morons
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the camera and the software but the folks at Contour are business morons and evidently cannot keep it going. I think it was a better set up than the GoPro but the Contour folks could not figure a way to stay in business.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: My new hobby....
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got one of these, it has been very entertaining. I have had nothing but a pleasant experience this camera. I've recorded about a dozen different sports from water skiing to paintball to biking to so on. The quality of the video is very impressive for a low cost camera but I would recommend an external microphone for better audio.
customer_reviews.author: splanka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera ... .MOV to MPEG4 directions
customer_reviews.text: I love this contour +2 POV Camera except you really have to know how to and look up how to switch it from making .mov to mpeg4 ... The instructions are there on how to do it but its more daunting for your average user to program. the directions are in here :
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, no software support
customer_reviews.text: This is my second contour camera and I love it all the more. its great and perfect and convenient. The only problem is that contour went out of business so there are no software downloads available so be warned. and you can't use the cameras deeper functions without it. unless you have the contour storyteller software already, i suggest looking for the contour HD. its a great camera and you can just move the videos from the card to your computer and its a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: M.Holst

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: the seller shipped on time and with no problem. The product itself was defective and I called talk to Contour to confirm my suspicions and they recommended that I was defective and should be returned and that's what I did. I don't think I will purchase the Contour+2 I will buy a lest expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this too make road trip videos of the scenic drives of California. The videos are great. I would consider using this as dash-cam all the time if I could find a way to power it. It seems it will not record if the USB cable is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: BraveBear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of kit, sound quality could improve
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera, video is crisp, gps works excellent, only two issues i have is the sound quality, wish it was better, though I know an external mic is needed to avoid the wind noise. Other issue is that you cant export the video with the gps data embedded except direct to youtube etc
customer_reviews.author: Abu Abdurrahman

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: great camera!! no problems and thrashed it through some very bad weather. It technically is not water proof. I had gotten stuck in a rain storm with it on my helmet. Once it was dry overnight, it started working right back like normal.
customer_reviews.author: clarkd

customer_reviews.title: Better than go-pro
customer_reviews.text: That's just my opinion, but the video comes out clean and clear. I especially like the app and the 'Story Teller' program. Overlaying a map with GPS info is pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: AbsoluteRock

customer_reviews.title: I thought this is a great action cam
customer_reviews.text: I thought this is a great action cam, tracks the route down the mountain, altitude and speed with built in GPS, my problem is that the GPS broke after one year. The camera will not turn on at all
customer_reviews.author: wally

customer_reviews.title: Love it and love the low profile of the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it and love the low profile of the camera as opposed to the awkwardness of the GoPro. Granted - it doesn't have all the bells and whistles of the Go-Pro so it is a trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: Don Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: ... all 4 of my contour are the very very best and they don't look ugly like a stupid GoPro
customer_reviews.text: gopro blows and all 4 of my contour are the very very best and they don't look ugly like a stupid GoPro.. gopro blows!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L Huck

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this for skiing. It takes great movies, is easy to use and does not get in the way of chairlift bars. We probably bought too much of a camera and the Contour Roam would have been sufficient for every day use. Never the less its a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am astounded at the quality of the video this bad boy takes. I have not used it as much as I planned, but have attached to my corgis who run, retrieve, fight, etc. Expensive but I am very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: KewlDadiJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The contour + 2 is easy to use while boarding with mittens or gloves. Easy to transfer the video to PC. all around great product. I have two boarding trip on it so far and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: BWC

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal camera for the money. I had trouble with contours in the past but the Bluetooth and format button should take care of all their earlier firmware issues.
customer_reviews.author: David Rosner

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed that after a long 4 day trip and sightseeing at Jasper and Banff National Park 3/4 of my video that I thought was captured were NOT. After getting home I was excited to share our trip and scenery I thought I captured with this camera. Lo and behold, some very interesting sights and moments while riding our motorcycle were not there to download. What a sad story to experience a great trip but to remember almost nothing to show :( . The downside is that there's no way to see whether camera is actually recording by using the slide switch.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Avanzado Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but audio is poor
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great. Great video. Only trouble I have is the audio is really muffled. I was using the camera with-out the water proof case. I need to try an external mic and see how that makes the audio sound.
customer_reviews.author: sound guy

customer_reviews.title: Updated version
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very easy to use. It is even easier to upload to a computer. Great for documenting new things.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Best Contour yet! Bluetooth rocks on my Android!
customer_reviews.text: This new Contour+2 with the Bluetooth is really nice for setting up videos. I have the surfboard mount and put magnets on it to video my softball kids pitching and hitting. Regular factory lens is good only for closeup action, but, with a different 12mm lens from ragecams.com installed turned this camera into a great hunting and sports video camera. No problems at all yet, when I get to the trails the GPS will be fun to try out.
customer_reviews.author: Dudleyfj40

customer_reviews.title: not bad not great
customer_reviews.text: Due to the lens focal point this cam gives very litle detail like a 35mm lens on a slr camera, very wide angle
customer_reviews.author: subdude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Contour, definitely prefer over the "teletubby" look. Great construction and durability.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and good price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product and good price and good quality and can think of only +ves will recommend this to anyone interested
customer_reviews.author: Praveen T.

customer_reviews.title: Contour Has Closed
customer_reviews.text: As of August the 2nd, the company doors were locked. So I wonder what happened to my camera, sent back with RMA. Good Luck if you buy one.' Aside from that, this was a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: Contour
customer_reviews.text: Nice imaging...the only thing I found difficult is syncing it to my droid phone. Couldn't get it to work so I was not able to edit any video.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lynn Hurt

customer_reviews.title: perfect delivery
customer_reviews.text: Everything perfect, i love my Contour, even underwater. The camera was in brand new condition. Many thanks for that .
customer_reviews.author: daniel huber

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I fly Helicopters for a living and this camera is perfect for strapping to the skidgear and getting some great vid! Bluetooth works great and I love the GPS feature. Would recommend for anyone interested in smooth video on action filled adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Unable to get support for this product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in June 2013. It worked great without a problem then last month the battery would not take a charge. I assumed this was that the battery had failed so I purchased an additional battery, same issue. I sent Contour an email requesting support and after two weeks no response. Now when you access their web site it gives you a message that their Sales Force DESK free trial has expired. On the web site you cant find a phone number to contact them, Quite disappointing since it appeared to be a good video recorded. The company's customer support is non existent!!
customer_reviews.author: tsolano

customer_reviews.title: So far this is a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera on my motorcycle as well as in my son's race car. Will be comparing it side by side with his GoPro this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great in bright light, Poor in low light conditions
customer_reviews.text: 1080p recording is not good for moving subjects. The play back can be choppy for this mode. The sync between the GPS positioning and the video is off.
customer_reviews.author: Kimet D.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Love my contiur, excellent picture quality. I need to find an adapter for my paintball mask and then i will be set.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Woo

customer_reviews.title: Android app not working
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect except that the smart phone app is not working on android platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain Bahari

customer_reviews.title: Simple Is Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera that works with the App from Apple like a charm. It comes with a great lens and a number of attachments accessories. Easy to set up and charge from a laptop or USB port charger. Works with Mac or Windows. Durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: DBCooper

customer_reviews.title: is this company out of business?
customer_reviews.text: just dished out a ton of cash for this thing. bought it September 12th 2013. unboxed just today & tried to download the latest firmware for it so I could connect via Bluetooth and the website was gone. waited a couple hours in case the site was just down for a bit and found the same busted website and no support. googled contour and it says they're out of business. assuming the worst here cuz their website has been down for over 4 hours. hope I can return this thing or i'm out $385+tax. crap!
customer_reviews.author: superdeeduper

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: it is a little confusing to me when it comes to the filter and exposure settings to get a good picture, especially for how bright it is here in Afghanistan, The camera seems to be able to do what it was advertised to do. Great quality 1080P HD and I love the rotating lens. Great product. The waterproof case is very high quality as well. Cant wait to use it for diving!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: At first I was undecided about getting it, but after reading reviews I decided to purchase it. It was a great decision! The camera is great, is small, and very easy to use. You get great videos and photos.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Autocrossing and Time Trials will never be the same
customer_reviews.text: This amazing aerodynamic camera captures awesome video while hitting top speed on the track and while twisting and turning through the sea of cones of autocross. Can be mounted virtually anywhere on your car and the audio is much better than the competition. You don't have to take your gloves off to turn it on either. Other cameras require a button push which is virtually impossible with your driving gloves on. The slide mechanism which locks 'on' makes this task extremely easy. You'll not be sorry you bought this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Speed Racer

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned after two uses...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive toy seemed to work OK for two patrols in Afghanistan but failed to work after that. Will have to send it to the manufacturer when back in the USA......
customer_reviews.author: Gustave E. Schlauch Sr.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: RUN!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! Contour has gone out of business and removed the link to the software you need to use with this product. This camera is worthless at this point.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Had difficulty from day one a. I phone app would not work b. GPS would not acquire signal c. Without GPS signal it would not record
customer_reviews.author: Luis Savigne

customer_reviews.title: it will be better if it could be smaller
customer_reviews.text: I can't find any mounts especially for diving. How could we use it for diving? 3750 and 3610 Mounts aren't used specific for diving.
customer_reviews.author: Hao TANG

product_meta.title: Contour +2 - Old Packaging (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Size:Old PackagingFROM THE MANUFACTURER
 



We took our most coveted features from the ContourROAM and the original Contour+ and created a camera that is not only easier to use, but brings an entirely new perspective to your adventures. Share beautiful 1080p HD video with speed, distance, and elevation across the social networks you use most. Featuring even better video quality, an Instant On-Record switch, and a 60-meter waterproof case for those underwater adventures, the Contour+2 will bring your stories to life like never before.





CONTOUR+2 PRODUCT FEATURES:

YOUR DATA EVERYWHERE
Unique to Contour, a GPS receiver allows you to capture and share a different perspective. The Contour+2 provides beautiful HD video with overlays for speed, elevation, and distance, so what you share to Facebook, YouTube, and Vimeo just got a lot more interesting.




MOBILE CONNECTIVITY OUT OF THE BOX
Use your mobile device to preview your shot before and while you’re recording, as a remote control, or to tweak your camera settings in the field.




LOCKING INSTANT ON-RECORD SWITCH
No power button, no problem. Simply slide the Instant On-Record switch into its locking position to ensure you shoot exactly when you’re ready.




IMPROVED ACTION VIDEO
We’ve used our roster of top-notch athletes in the world’s most diverse conditions to help us test and fine-tune the sensor in the Contour+2, which features our highest quality action video, ever.




RECORD UP TO 120FPS
In addition to shooting in four different HD modes including 1080p, the Contour+2 also shoots 120 frames per second in 480p. That means super slow motion video is now at your fingertips.




VERSATILITY
Take the Contour+2 anywhere. With a huge variety of mounts to choose from, as well as the included waterproof case, the Contour+2 will work virtually anywhere. The 270° rotating lens allows for mounting in any position.




EXTERNAL MICROPHONE JACK
Achieve clear, crisp audio easily with Contour+2’s external microphone jack. Mic gain is easily adjusted in the settings menu from the mobile app or Storyteller.




COMPLETELY CUSTOMIZABLE VIDEO
The Contour+2 gives you the ability to fine-tune your camera settings. Adjust white balance, contrast, sharpness, exposure, and metering to customize the perfect shot, whether on the snow, in the sun, or deep in the woods.







VIDEO FORMATS
Video Format Resolution Frame Rate Full HD 1080p 1920 x 1080 30 fps Tall HD 960p 1280 x 960 30 fps Action HD 1280 x 720 60 fps, or 30 fps Slow Motion 854 x 480 120 fps, 60 fps, or 30 fps 5MP Still Photo 2592 X 1944 1, 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, 45, of 60 sec 




WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 

Contour+2 Camera
Waterproof Case
Micro SD Card (4GB) Profile Mount
Rotating Flat Surface Mount
Quickstart Guide Rechargeable Battery
USB 2.0 Cable Mini HDMI Cable
Mic Cable 






COMPARE CONTOUR CAMERA MODELS
CONTOURROAM Anywhere, Anytime CONTOUR+ Creative Freedom CONTOUR+2 The Next Evolution Instant On Record Switch Record Switch Lock Waterproof to one meter Built-in Tripod (1/4" - 20) Mount Flush Front Lens Still Photo Mode Laser Alignment Removable Lithium-ion Battery GPS Bluetooth HDMI USB Connection Internal Mic External Mic Jack microSD Memory Card Included 2GB 4GB Wide Angle Lens 170° 170° 170° Lens Rotation 270° 270° 270° Weight 5.1oz 5.3oz 5.5oz Dimensions (mm) 100 x 55 x 34 95 x 58 x 34 98 x 60 x 34 Included Mounts Profile Mount, Rotating Surface Mount Profile Mount, Rotating Surface Mount (2) Profile Mount, Rotating Surface Mount (2) Included Cables USB USB, Mini HDMI, Mic Cable USB, Mini HDMI, Mic Cable Included Case Waterproof Case 



CONTOUR RECOMMENDED ACCESSORIES
CONTOUR VENTED HELMET MOUNT 

CONTOUR PROFILE MOUNT 

CONTOUR FLEX STRAP MOUNT 

CONTOUR WINDSHIELD MOUNT
feature_bullets: Easy to Use Simply slide the Instant On-Record Switch into its locking position and the camera powers on and starts recording to ensure you begin filming exactly when you’re ready. The Laser Level ensures you get the perfect angle every time.
Low-Profile Design Contour cameras have won numerous awards for their stylish, yet functional, low-profile design that’s simple and fun to use.
Connected Experience Bluetooth pairs to your iOS/Android device allowing you to preview the shot and adjust the camera settings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars133 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
